snippet: The College Board does not typically offer a summertime SAT exam, but it was planning to make an exception on Aug. 3 for students enrolled in a $4,500 program.
abstract: The College Board does not typically offer a summertime SAT exam, but it was planning to make an exception on Aug. 3 for students enrolled in a $4,500 program.

headline.main: College Board Cancels Summer SAT for Select Students, Calling It 'Inappropriate'
